remarks: Lemma for ~ paddass .  Use ~ elpaddn0 to eliminate ` x ` and ` r ` from ~ paddasslem15 .  (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2012.)
statement:
paddasslem.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
paddasslem.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
paddasslem.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
paddasslem.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
paddasslem16 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X C_ A /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) /\ ( ( X =/= (/) /\ ( Y .+ Z ) =/= (/) ) /\ ( Y =/= (/) /\ Z =/= (/) ) ) ) -> ( X .+ ( Y .+ Z ) ) C_ ( ( X .+ Y ) .+ Z ) ) $.
